text: I know how you missed it! Right now our docs make `integrationThreadId` appear to be optional upon posting the first message in a conversation. Realistically, it's not. We'll update the docs. And at some point will start validating it as a required field.

I am on to the next problem of api authentication at an app level instead of user level to manage routing between multiple custom channels. I did not see any articles around it, but hoping I can put something together.
